title: Junior Web FullStack Developer - Ainara De Pablo

jobs_description.title: Web Developer
jobs_description.description: In charge of website maintenance for one of the clients, as well as updating Prestashop for another.
list: Creation of functional documentation for training received on Prestashop

jobs_description.title: Supermarket Stock Clerk
jobs_description.description: Responsible for maintaining an efficient and organized inventory across different aisles. Provided customer service and assistance, offering information about products and their location in the store. Also participated in online order management, including preparation, packaging, and timely delivery of products.

jobs_description.title: Director of Photography
jobs_description.description: I was responsible for the direction and supervision of cinematography, lighting, and visual composition. I planned and executed scene lighting to create the appropriate atmosphere, collaborating closely with the director and the production team to develop and maintain the filmâ€™s visual aesthetics throughout much of the shoot.

projects.title: Go Local
projects.description: Final project for the DAW degree (Web Application Development). This is an application through which people can connect with local guides, who will show corners and customs unique to locals for those looking to travel in a more conscious and responsible way.

projects.title: Virtual ATM
projects.description: Activity 2 in DAW, where a virtual ATM is implemented, applying the MVC pattern with Spring Boot and a persistence layer for data access with Spring Data JPA.

projects.title: Order Microservices
projects.description: This project involves the development of a RESTful API using the Spring Boot framework, along with Spring Data JPA for data persistence management and a MySQL 8 database to store the information. The goal is to provide a series of web services that enable efficient data interaction, tested with Postman, while adhering to the principles of the REST model.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Recent graduate in Web Application Development (DAW)
about.description: Hello! I'm Ainara, a web developer passionate about programming. Since I started coding, I've discovered that it's more than just a job for me; it's a hobby that brings me great satisfaction and makes me lose track of time. While I have a special inclination towards backend development, I also enjoy exploring the frontend. I'm excited about the opportunity to apply my skills and continue learning in the world of web development.
